column2: You're the new guy? Okay, my name is Jimmy, but whatever you do, do NOT listen to Avery!
AHHHHHHHH! GET THAT AWAY FROM ME!
Do adults like this stuff? I certainly don't.
This is the best! Thank you so much!
If Avery tells you he is up to something, PLEASE tell me before it's too late.
column3: I like Miss Sophia, she know so many things!
column4: When I grow up, I want to be a farmer just like Daddy!
